name: Default DJ dps extention library
description: This library provide basic extentions for data processing

distance.name: Extension "distance"
distance.description: provide various word distances js implementation

rss.name: Module "rss"
rss.description: Provides extensions for data extraction from rss

getChannelItems.name: Extension "getChannelItems"
getChannelItems.description:
Extract channel items from rss. 
Arguments: 
url: url for rss (required); encoding: rss file encoding (optional, defualt value: "utf8")

getChannelHeadlines.name: Extension "getChannelHeadlines"
getChannelHeadlines.description:
Extract item titles from rss. 
Arguments: 
url: url for rss (required); encoding: rss file encoding (optional, defualt value: "utf8")

newsWordTable.name: Extension "newsWordTable"
newsWordTable.description:
Extract item titles from rss. 
Arguments: 
url: url for rss (required); encoding: rss file encoding (optional, defualt value: "utf8")

processing.name: Module "processing"
processing.description: Provides extensions for data extraction from rss

wordDistance.name: Extension "wordDistance"
wordDistance.description:
Extract channel items from rss. 
Arguments: 
url: url for rss (required); encoding: rss file encoding (optional, defualt value: "utf8")
